1. Installation

1.1. Clone the repository

The repo can be cloned from the Github repo Begreppstjänst into a suitable local directory.

Certain Python dependencies are required for the app to function.

data-wizard==1.3.0
Django==3.2.13
django-admin-multiple-choice-list-filter==0.1.1
django-admin-rangefilter==0.8.1
django-crispy-forms==1.9.0
django-debug-toolbar==2.2
django-extensions==2.2.9
django-simple-history==3.0.0
djangorestframework==3.12.4
mysqlclient==2.0.1
Sphinx==4.5.0
sphinx-rtd-theme==1.0.0
sphinxcontrib-applehelp==1.0.2
sphinxcontrib-devhelp==1.0.2
sphinxcontrib-htmlhelp==2.0.0
sphinxcontrib-jsmath==1.0.1
sphinxcontrib-qthelp==1.0.3
sphinxcontrib-serializinghtml==1.1.5
XlsxWriter==3.0.1

1.2. Install package requirements

If your hosting solution offers the possibility of Python virtual environments, you need to activate that environment on the server and install the required packages using the following command:

pip install -r requirements.txt

1.3. Setup the database

Set up your hosted database. This app was originally configured to run on MySQL / MariaDB, but there is no reason why it cannot be used on Postgresql instead.
